tool.name: dvips
tool.summary: Sets construction variables for the dvips utility.

builder.name: PostScript
builder.summary:
Builds a .ps file from a .dvi input file (or, by extension, a .tex, .ltx, or .latex input file). The suffix specified by the &cv-link-PSSUFFIX; construction variable (.ps by default) is added automatically to the target if it is not already present. Example:
# builds from aaa.tex env.PostScript(target = 'aaa.ps', source = 'aaa.tex') # builds bbb.ps from bbb.dvi env.PostScript(target = 'bbb', source = 'bbb.dvi')

cvar.name: DVIPS
cvar.summary: The TeX DVI file to PostScript converter.

cvar.name: DVIPSFLAGS
cvar.summary: General options passed to the TeX DVI file to PostScript converter.

cvar.name: PSCOM
cvar.summary: The command line used to convert TeX DVI files into a PostScript file.

cvar.name: PSCOMSTR
cvar.summary: The string displayed when a TeX DVI file is converted into a PostScript file. If this is not set, then &cv-link-PSCOM; (the command line) is displayed.

cvar.name: PSPREFIX
cvar.summary: The prefix used for PostScript file names.

cvar.name: PSSUFFIX
cvar.summary: The prefix used for PostScript file names.
